Historically a democrat president inherits a crappy economy from a republican administration, and trump wasn’t president long enough to ruin a strong economy still recovering  during the Obama administration. So things will look much better once an effective vaccine is identified. Let’s hope the Pfizer vaccine delivers.

links.title: S&P 500 Weekly Update: Obsessing Over The Election Turned Out To Be A Mistake
links.description: "Information is not knowledge." - Albert Einstein Last week it was all about "the calm before the storm". Instead of more anxiety, the storm turned out to be a whirlwind for the Bulls. It's finally over. Yes although we don't have a declared "winner" three days after an election, it's over.
